title: H
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''h''' will move you one square to the left.
*Pressing '''shift+h''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''h''' represents a [[List of canines|canine]]- or [[hog]]- type monster.
*'''H''' represents legendary monsters such as [[sphinx|sphinxes]], [[hippogriff]]s and [[Minotaur (monster)|minotaurs]].
